org.rcsb.mbt.ui.views.StructureViewerImpl
Class SsGeometry

java.lang.Object
  org.rcsb.mbt.ui.views.StructureViewerImpl.GeometryEntity
      org.rcsb.mbt.ui.views.StructureViewerImpl.SsGeometry
Direct Known Subclasses:
CoilGeometry, HelixGeometry, StrandGeometry
public class SsGeometry
extends GeometryEntity

SsGeometry is the base class for the geometry of all Secondary Structure objects.

Author:
Apostol Gramada
